tool_description: Analyzes sentiment of customer reviews using advanced NLP techniques and provides sentiment scores, confidence levels, and emotion detection.

structured_reviews_source.description: Source identifier for structured review data from Review Parser

sentiment_model.description: Sentiment analysis model to use: basic, advanced, or domain_specific

include_emotions.description: Whether to detect specific emotions beyond positive/negative sentiment

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for sentiment classification (0.0-1.0)

batch_size.description: Number of reviews to process in each batch

error_messages: Invalid source data: structured_reviews_source not found or contains no valid review text.
Model loading failed: The specified sentiment_model could not be loaded or is not available.
Confidence threshold error: confidence_threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Processing timeout: Batch processing exceeded time limits, try reducing batch_size.
Insufficient text data: Reviews contain insufficient text for reliable sentiment analysis.
usage: Provide structured_reviews_source from Review Parser. Optionally configure model type, emotion detection, and processing parameters. Returns sentiment scores and classifications.

total_reviews_analyzed.description: Total number of reviews processed for sentiment

sentiment_distribution.description: Distribution of sentiment scores: [positive_count, neutral_count, negative_count]

confidence_scores.description: Array of confidence scores for each sentiment classification

analysis_summary.description: Summary of sentiment analysis results and key insights
